messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] abortion debate
messages.msgSnippet: here here. It is truly pointless to try and convince someone you are right , when they are trying just as hard to convince you that they are right . We all
messages.messageBody:
here here.
It is truly pointless to try and convince someone you
are "right", when they are trying just as hard to
convince you that they are "right". We all believe
differently on these subjects, let's get over it. How
do you guyz even have the time to devote to such
debates?
-Bobbie
--- Amy Spang <aspang1@...> wrote:
> You know what? Maybe all of this religious/abortion
> discussion would
> better be addressed on a list specifically devoted
> to religious issues.
> Maybe one of you could begin such a list and allow
> this one to return to
> to its original intended purpose. There is nothing
> wrong with brief
> discussions on tangent issues, but this one is
> rapidly spiraling out of
> control. Amy in NY
>

messages.subject: abortion debate
messages.msgSnippet: You know what?  Maybe all of this religious/abortion discussion would better be addressed on a list specifically devoted to religious issues. Maybe one of you
messages.messageBody:
You know what? Maybe all of this religious/abortion discussion would
better be addressed on a list specifically devoted to religious issues.
Maybe one of you could begin such a list and allow this one to return to
to its original intended purpose. There is nothing wrong with brief
discussions on tangent issues, but this one is rapidly spiraling out of
control. Amy in NY
